DOC.detailed_description: Following screening , study comprises total 3 clinic visit ( 2 outpatient visit , 1 overnight stay ) complete 2 week period . For outpatient visit , body composition ( DEXA ) , visceral fat ( CT ) , ectopic fat ( MRS CT ) aerobic fitness ( VO2max test ) measure . Women also ovarian parameter ( follicle size number ) measure MR scan . Following overnight stay inpatient unit , insulin sensitivity ( euglycemic hyperinsulinemic clamp ) , interstitial lipolysis ( microdialysis ) , whole body lipolysis glycolysis ( stable isotope ) , abdominal adipose tissue oxygen content ( Hunt Direct Methods ) measure subcutaneous fat biopsy abdominal gluteo-femoral tissue collect . Women complete test follicular phase menstrual cycle .
DOC.criteria: Diabetic men woman age 40 60 , inclusive healthy men woman age 20 35 , inclusive . Body mass index ( ratio height weight ) less 25 kg/m2 ( lean group ) 27 35 kg/m2 ( overweight/obese group ) . Not involved regular physical activity ( 3 time per week ) . Women must regular menstrual cycle ( 1 menstrual bleed month ) . For men overweight/obese group , waist circumference less 102cm ( 40 inch ) . You smoke . You liver , kidney , thyroid heart disease , cancer . You claustrophobic . You metal object body implant rod surgical clip . If diabetic take steroid , protease inhibitor , statin , antihypertensive medication know alter glucose lipid metabolism . If diabetic take steroid , protease inhibitor , injectable antihyperglycemic medication ( oral diabetic med allow . ) If woman , pregnant breast feed try become pregnant ( woman become pregnant throughout study exclude ) . If woman , use hormonal contraceptive anovulation , androgen excess irregular menstrual cycle ( less 1 cycle per month ) . You previously BMI > 35 kg/m2 . You able eat food provide PBRC . If weight stable .
